text:
*How to invite a team?*

:small_orange_diamond: *One-click Connect*: Share <https://www.smooz.io/guest/597217b30963360004427eed|this link> with a team you want to invite

_:arrow_right: When the other team clicks on 'Add to Slack', Smooz creates a shared channel between you and them._
_:arrow_right: Each team you invite this way, will appear in its own dedicated channel._

:small_orange_diamond: You can create additional channels, invite more teams, and access settings, from your <https://www.smooz.io/dashboard|dashboard>.
